description:
"So Pete, you got some fresh meat here."
"I do," Pete said, looking at Brendan. "Absolutely, I'm excited!"
"How do you feel about that, Brendan?"
"I'm excited, a little nervous... you know, see what happens," he said. "Today's the first of many things, I guess..."
"Did you see his weiner?"
"I did," Brendan said, laughing and blushing as he looked at Pete's crotch. "It looks pretty big... I'm not gonna lie. I guess it's gonna be payback for all the girls I did it to."
And then, Brendan got his beautiful butt fucked hard by Pete!
title: Brendan & Pete
